pageProps.title: Neuralcoref Visualizer
pageProps.teaser: State-of-the-art coreference resolution based on neural nets and spaCy

data.title: Neuralcoref Visualizer
data.slogan: State-of-the-art coreference resolution based on neural nets and spaCy
data.description: In short, coreference is the fact that two or more expressions in a text – like pronouns or nouns – link to the same person or thing. It is a classical Natural language processing task, that has seen a revival of interest in the past two years as several research groups applied cutting-edge deep-learning and reinforcement-learning techniques to it. It is also one of the key building blocks to building conversational Artificial intelligences.
data.author: Hugging Face
